name: LD 37 Project hotel
description:
This is a procedural hotel in which you need to find one room. You can find this one room by papers that guide you to it.

The controls are:

"w", "a", "s" and "d" to walk.

"q" and "e" to press buttons and grab and release objects.

hold "esc" for one second to quit the game.

This game was planned to get a story that tells you about the one room while your are searching for it. But I did not had the time to finish this idea. Though I do like this little game and I'm thinking about doing a post ludum dare update.
